## 7 Layer Architecture
The OSI Model follows a layered architecture
7. **Application Layer**:
6. **Presentation Layer**:
5. **Session Layer**:
4. **Transport Layer**:
3. **Network Layer**:
2. **Data Link Layer**:
1. **Physical Layer**:

| Layer | Name         | Description |
| ----- | ------------ | ----------- |
| 7     | Application  |             |
| 6     | Presentation |             |
| 5     | Session      |             |
| 4     | Transport    |             |
| 3     | Network      |             |
| 2     | Data Link    |             |
| 1     | Physical     |             |
